message:
A restaurant near Seattle-Tacoma International Airport is so tired of the way the Transportation Security Administration (TSA) has been treating their customers that they've actually banned agents from eating at the establishment.

‎"'Their kind aren't welcomed in our establishment,' McLawson continued. 'A large majority of our customers--over 90 percent--agree with our stance & stand by our decision. We even have the police on our side & they have helped us escort TSA agents out of our cafe. Until TSA agents start treating us with the respect & dignity that we deserve, then things will change for them in the private sector.'"

http://www.rawstory.com/rs/2011/02/23/seattle-restaurant-puts-tsa-workers-on-no-eat-list
